headings.content: Discover Digital Art, Collect and Sell Your Specific NFTs.

texts.content: Partner with one of the world's largest retailers to showcase your brand and products.

items.title: Setup Your Wallet
items.subtitle: Step-01
items.description: Once youâ€™ve set up your wallet of choice, connect it to <store name> by clicking the Wallet Connect button in the top right corner.

items.title: Create Your Collection
items.subtitle: Step-02
items.description: Click the Collection menu and set up your collection. Add a name, a description, a link, logo & banner image, and choose blockchain.

items.title: Add Your NFTs
items.subtitle: Step-03
items.description: Upload your work (image), add a title and description, and customize your NFTs with properties and unlockable content.

items.title: List NFTs For Sale
items.subtitle: Step-04
items.description: Choose between auctions and fixed-price listings. You choose how you want to sell your NFTs, and we help you sell them!
